long_description: With an upright riding position, nimble handling and a carbon fork for a smooth ride, the men's Cannondale Quick 4 bike is well-suited to commutes, tours or fitness rides. Carbon fork, shaped chainstays and seatstays help absorb road vibration; flat handlebar places the rider in a comfortable, upright riding position. 6061 aluminum frame uses Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology to effectively damp road vibration. Ergonomically shaped rubber grips offer plush padding underhand. Shimano derailleurs and shifters supply dependable shifts through the 24 gear combinations. Linear-pull brakes deliver effective deceleration so you can manage your speed efficiently. Kenda Kwick Trax tires feature a versatile tread pattern to handle city riding. Eyelets accept fenders or a rack (not included). Specs on the Cannondale Quick 4 men's bike are subject to change.
short_description: With an upright riding position, nimble handling and a carbon fork for a smooth ride, the men's Cannondale Quick 4 bike is well-suited to commutes, tours or fitness rides.
